All of these factors were taken into consideration during the pandemic situation by the business owners and strategy planners. In order to stabilize the market post pandemic, businesses took crucial decisions and let the market sable. Some of the key decisions impacted the manufacturing, process of the products, and supply to retailers. To cope up with the increasing demand, businesses took extra efforts to deliver right product to right customers.
